snippet: The company will replace its entire model line, staking its immediate future on a single chassis architecture with one basic engine and transmission.
abstract: Volvo Cars, in audacious reinvention of itself, plans to replace its entire model line, basing new line on single chassis architecture with one basic engine and transmission; strategy will give company wide range of options to make vehicles of different sizes, weights and horsepower rating while retaining the economic benefits of using many common parts.
lead_paragraph: The company will replace its entire model line, staking its immediate future on a single chassis architecture with one basic engine and transmission.

headline.main: Volvo Plan: 1 Platform for All Cars
headline.print_headline: Volvo Plan: 1 Platform for All Cars
